org.kepler.gui.kar

Class ImportModuleDependenciesAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • ptolemy.vergil.toolbox.FigureAction
        • org.kepler.gui.kar.ImportModuleDependenciesAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action

    public class ImportModuleDependenciesAction
extends FigureAction
    This action opens the ModuleManager for downloading new modules that are specified in the KAR dependencies.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
